item.title: email to customer service
item.description: 15:11 Tuesday 03 July 2018 JST To cs@r….t.com SUBJECT: Unauthorized charges on my credit card Hello My name is Rob Nugen, and I am writing to ask you to remove unauthorized charges from my credit card. My credit card number is (REDACTED) On or around April 15, 2018, I used my credit card to do age verification for https://free-adult-games.com/ The website URL and name both indicate the content is free.

item.title: note to self: do not sign up for porn
item.description: 28 May 2018 JST Transcript from the first time I cancelled these porn charges 14:45 Tuesday 03 July 2018 JST Department: Chat Support Teams Full Name: Rob Nugen Email: freerabbit@p.............y.com Your Question: Can you remove all the charges that have been placed on my account? Operator: KHD-Mercy A. 22:06 Your Question: Can you remove all the charges that have been placed on my account? 22:06 Please wait and one of our operators will be with you shortly.

item.title: cancelled porn charges

10:43 Tuesday 29 May 2018 JST Department: Chat Support Teams Full Name: Rob Nugen Email: csv@csvwebsupport.com Your Question: What product am I supposed to have received? Operator: KHD-Allen V. 18:43 Your Question: What product am I supposed to have received?
